name: Slice Star
description:
Slice star is an addictive and extremely impressive slicing game.
You have only one goal, feed your Bunny by slicing the cake.

Beware of fruits, do not slice them.
Slice beautiful and colorful cakes but you must be quick
Ants are stealing your cakes.
Bees are blocking your view
Use ice booster to freeze all fruits
Try super blade to slice cakes, moulds and fruits
Play up to 200 challenging levels

Before you download this experience, please consider
that this app contains social media links to connect with other,
in-app purchases that cost real money, as well as advertising for
Devil Delight Entertainment and some third parties.

Let’s Slice Them All

Play more enjoy more
